Uses of Package
com.google.inject.tools.suite.module

Packages that use com.google.inject.tools.suite.module
com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin Tools integrating guice with development environments. 
com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.bindings Classes for finding the bindings of a given Java element in the user's code. 
com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.module Module management objects specific to the IDE plugin tool. 
com.google.inject.tools.suite Tools for using guice. 
com.google.inject.tools.suite.code The code package is the objects for running code snippets in userspace. 
com.google.inject.tools.suite.module Classes for representing and managing modules in the user's code. 
 

Classes in com.google.inject.tools.suite.module used by com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin
ModuleManager
          Responsible for tracking the modules which should be run when resolving bindings and injections.

ModulesSource
          Responsible for listening to changes in the user's code involving Modules.

          Listener for changes in the modules available.
